_header: Love haveth me brought in lither thought
_description: Three quatrains, possibly the conclusion of a longer piece

BLHar913.First Lines:
Loue hauiþ me broȝt in liþer
                    þoȝtþoȝt ic ab to blinne…
BLHar913.Last Lines:
…Fare ic wiþ outen arear i be broȝt to
                    grunde
BLHar913.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James. 
             Early English Poems and Lives of Saints.
Transactions of the London Philological Society
         1858; Pt. 2, Berlin, 1862: 21-2.
Schipper,  Jakob. 
             Englische Metrik….
         2 vols. Bonn: Strauss, 1881, 1888: 1.317.
Heuser,  Wilhelm. 
             Die Kildare-Gedichte…
Bonner Beiträge zur Anglistik
         14. Bonn: P. Hanstein, 1904: 166.
